TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class HttpMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class HttpMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Applying this attribute to an XML Web service client using HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST, sets the types that serialize the parameters sent to an XML Web service method and read the response from the XML Web service method. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If an XML Web service client calls an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> must be set to `XmlReturnReader` and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A> set to `UrlParameterWriter`. XML Web service clients invoking a XML Web service using HTTP-POST must set <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> to `XmlReturnReader` and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A> to `HtmlFormParameterWriter`.
## Examples The following example is a proxy class generated by the Wsdl.exe utility for calling an XML Web service utility using HTTP-POST. The Wsdl.exe automatically supplies the correct types for <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A>, along with specifying that the proxy class inherits from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpPostClientProtocol>.
[!code-cpp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a that serializes parameters sent from an XML Web service client to the XML Web service method.
Docs.value: A that serializes parameters sent from an XML Web service client to an XML Web service method. There is no default.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the XML Web service client is invoking an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A> must be `XMLReturnReader`.
## Examples The example is a proxy class generated by the Wsdl.exe utility for an XML Web service client using HTTP-GET, setting <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A> to the required value of `XMLReturnReader`.
[!code-cpp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ ReturnFormatter { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };
member this.ReturnFormatter : Type with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a that deserializes the response from an XML Web service method.
Docs.value: A that deserializes the response from an XML Web service method. There is no default.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the XML Web service client is invoking an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> must be `UrlParameterWriter`, whereas a client using HTTP-POST must set <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> to `HtmlFormParameterWriter`.
## Examples The example is a proxy class generated by the Wsdl.exe utility for an XML Web service client using HTTP-GET, setting <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> to the required value of `UrlParameterWriter`.
[!code-cpp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
